* Recode old SAT math section to new SAT math section (200-800 scale)

RECODE old_sat (200=200)
(210=220)
(220=230)
(230=250)
(240=260)
(250=280)
(260=300)
(270=310)
(280=330)
(290=340)
(300=350)
(310=360)
(320=360)
(330=370)
(340=380)
(350=390)
(360=400)
(370=410)
(380=420)
(390=430)
(400=440)
(410=450)
(420=460)
(430=470)
(440=480)
(450=490)
(460=500)
(470=510)
(480=510)
(490=520)
(500=530)
(510=540)
(520=550)
(530=560)
(540=570)
(550=570)
(560=580)
(570=590)
(580=600)
(590=610)
(600=620)
(610=630)
(620=640)
(630=650)
(640=660)
(650=670)
(660=690)
(670=700)
(680=710)
(690=720)
(700=730)
(710=740)
(720=750)
(730=760)
(740=760)
(750=770)
(760=780)
(770=780)
(780=790)
(790=800)
(800=800) INTO new_sat.



* Usage example:

INPUT PROGRAM.
LOOP id=1 to 10.
END CASE.
END LOOP.
END FILE.
END INPUT PROGRAM.
EXECUTE.

COMPUTE old_sat=TRUNC(RV.UNIFORM(200,800),10).
EXECUTE.

RECODE old_sat (200=200)
(210=220)
(220=230)
(230=250)
(240=260)
(250=280)
(260=300)
(270=310)
(280=330)
(290=340)
(300=350)
(310=360)
(320=360)
(330=370)
(340=380)
(350=390)
(360=400)
(370=410)
(380=420)
(390=430)
(400=440)
(410=450)
(420=460)
(430=470)
(440=480)
(450=490)
(460=500)
(470=510)
(480=510)
(490=520)
(500=530)
(510=540)
(520=550)
(530=560)
(540=570)
(550=570)
(560=580)
(570=590)
(580=600)
(590=610)
(600=620)
(610=630)
(620=640)
(630=650)
(640=660)
(650=670)
(660=690)
(670=700)
(680=710)
(690=720)
(700=730)
(710=740)
(720=750)
(730=760)
(740=760)
(750=770)
(760=780)
(770=780)
(780=790)
(790=800)
(800=800) INTO new_sat.
EXECUTE.
